'''Brad Nystrom''' is the father of [[Kendrick Nystrom]].

==History==
Brad and his family were moving to Wisconsin. His son, Kendrick, didn't want to go because of his girlfriend, [[Lauren]], whom he didn't want to leave. They superglued themselves together, so Brad took them to the ER, where [[April Kepner]] worked to separate them. She had to tried a few differently things before she was finally able to get them apart.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married.

===Familial===
His son, Kendrick, was upset when he learned that the family was moving to Wisconsin, so much that he glued himself to his girlfriend, [[Lauren]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*The Nystrom family has a pet dog.
